mapper.insert: insert into posts (uid, title, text, category, created, updated) values(#{uid}, #{title}, #{text}, #{category}, #{created}, #{updated})
mapper.update: UPDATE posts SET title = #{title}, text = #{text}, category = #{category}, updated = #{updated} WHERE pid = #{pid}
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM posts WHERE title LIKE CONCAT('%', TRIM(#{keyword}), '%') OR text LIKE CONCAT('%', TRIM(#{keyword}), '%')
